src:
Polisi Rusia Ditembak Mati di Jalanan, Pernah Lolos dari Upaya Pembunuhan
04 Nov 2019, 12:14 by Rita Uli Hutapea
Moskow - Seorang polisi senior Rusia ditembak mati di jalanan di Moskow, Rusia. Pria ini sebelumnya pernah lolos dari upaya pembunuhan.
"Seorang pria tak dikenal menembaki dua pria di sebelah barat ibu kota, salah satunya adalah direktur pusat antiekstremisme Republik Ingushetia," demikian disampaikan komisi investigasi Moskow mengenai polisi senior yang tewas tersebut. Polisi tersebut beserta saudara laki-lakinya tewas dalam insiden penembakan di jalanan Moskow pada Sabtu (2/11) waktu setempat.
Dalam statemennya, komisi investigasi Moskow menyatakan seperti dilansir kantor berita AFP, Senin (4/11/2019), kedua pria itu tewas di tempat kejadian dan para penyelidik tengah memeriksa kamera CCTV di kawasan tersebut.
text:
Russian Police Shot Dead on the Street, Never Escaped an Attempt to Kill
Nov 04 2019, 12:14 by Rita Uli Hutapea
Moscow - A senior Russian police officer was shot dead on a street in Moscow, Russia. This man had previously escaped an assassination attempt.
"An unknown man opened fire on two men west of the capital, one of whom was the director of the Republic of Ingushetia's anti-extremism center," said the Moscow investigative commission regarding the senior policeman who died. The policeman and his brother were killed in a shooting incident on the streets of Moscow on Saturday (2/11) local time.
In its statement, the Moscow investigative commission said as reported by the AFP news agency on Monday (11/04/2019), the two men were killed at the scene and investigators were examining CCTV cameras in the region.
